column1: * Beleg is unable to persuade Túrin to come with him
column2: despite that he has been pardoned by Thingol. Beleg leaves to return to Doriath.

column1: * Increasing numbers of orcs enter Brethil; the Gaurwaith are forced southwards down the Old South Road (Beleriand).
* The Outlaws encounter the Petty-dwarves Mim who offers them his home Amon Rûdh in return for his life. It is known as Bar-en-Danwedh
*Beleg sets out again to return to Túrin.
